sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with yin pi 飲癖 , rheum aggregation-illness. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 20: 此由飲 水多，水氣停聚兩脅之間，遇寒氣相搏，則結聚而成塊，謂之癖飲 , “This results from excessive rheum liquid. The liquid qi collects in the region of the two flanks. There it clashes with cold qi. As a result it forms nodular amassments that generate lumps. One calls this ‘ aggregation-illness rheum ’”.
